snippet: Never a svelte figure, Mr. Gingrich seems to have put on weight as the campaign has entered its seventh month.
abstract: Never a svelte figure, Mr. Gingrich seems to have put on weight as the campaign has entered its seventh month.
lead_paragraph: INDEPENDENCE, Iowa -- Is it a coincidence that Newt Gingrich's long and winding bus tour has stopped at many food businesses?

headline.main: Gingrich on the Culinary Trail in Iowa
